roleset.name: determine quite detailedly

example.name: pinpoint-v: transitive
example.text: Osamu Nagayama , deputy president of Chugai , which spends about 15 % of its sales on research and development , was unable to pinpoint how much money Chugai would pump into Gen - Probe .

propbank.arg: Osamu Nagayama , deputy president of Chugai , which spends about 15 % of its sales on research and development
how much money Chugai would pump into Gen - Probe

example.name: pin-pointing-n
example.text: The recognition of such a connection helped confirm the seafloor - spreading hypothesis by pin - pointing the zones where Hess had predicted oceanic crust is being generated -LRB- along the ridges -RRB- and the zones where oceanic lithosphere sinks back into the mantle -LRB- beneath the trenches -RRB- .

propbank.arg: The recognition of such a connection
the zones where Hess had predicted oceanic crust is being generated -LRB- along the ridges -RRB- and the zones where oceanic lithosphere sinks back into the mantle -LRB- beneath the trenches -RRB-
